meanings.definition: The quality or state of being welcome.
meanings.sent1: The welcomeness of the party made everyone feel happy.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the welcomeness of the new neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The welcomeness of the surprise visit caught me off guard.
meanings.sent4: Her smile radiated a welcomeness that put everyone at ease.
meanings.sent5: The welcomeness of the cozy fireplace on a cold night was comforting.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being welcome or accepted.
meanings.sent1: The welcomeness of their invitation warmed my heart.
meanings.sent2: She exuded welcomeness towards all the guests at the event.
meanings.sent3: The welcomeness of the group hug was contagious.
meanings.sent4: In a foreign land, the welcomeness of the locals was a relief.
meanings.sent5: The welcomeness of the team made the new member feel valued.
